title: Amazing
comment: Great for expense reports.

title: Awesome
comment: This app is a true time saver! Exports the receipts save Acccount Payable and Receivable gets them and can do a CSV export also so I can import easily into Oracle! Saves me a full days work when I get back from business trips!

title: Excellent app and customer service
comment: I've been using this app for a while and find it really useful. Only gap (or so I thought) was the ability to grab a screen shot and attach it to a receipt. I finally sent an email with this feedback and very quickly received detailed and accurate information RE how to do this. Very happy!

title: Best ever
comment: This app is marvelous. If it's changed my entire receipt submission process and made it much more efficient great job

title: Consulting
comment: Great for a traveling consultant.

title: Clean interface and custom settings
comment: Intuitively organize receipts, mileage and  data to share with your project team. Developer is responsive and available.

title: A very useful app
comment: Well designed, with excellent configurability to suit most needs.

title: Great help when traveling
comment: Great app and awesome tech support when I was upgrading my phone.
Love this app very user friendly

title: Great App
comment: Brilliant app. Would be 5 star if it had the ability to schedule backup to gdrive or an alternate location

title: Great app!!!
comment: Worth every penny.

Great app! Been using it for a few months now and it's a godsend. Love the customisations and ability to upload to Google Drive. Would love for it to sync between my phone and tablet, hopefully that will come in future update.

title: Good product
comment: Great product but taking photos of receipts on my galaxy s6 edge 5.0.1 is currently buggy. When I take the picture it still acts as if I'm taking a picture so I can't see what it looks like. I have to click the tick finish the receipt entry and then view the image to see if it worked. An annoying process for all my receipt images. Apart from the its a great app and I love the import export feature.

Hi Phillip, 

Would you mind emailing me about this item - I have some suggestions for how to potentially fix this. Thanks!

title: Vers good
comment: Four stars bécasse I can't put it ont m'y SD card.

title: Great app!
comment: Makes my life much easier

title: Easy to use.
comment: Simple & easy with professional looking reports.  Great tool for managing my credit card accounts.

title: Freaking Awesome
comment: I use this for everything. I even figured away to track income.

title: Getting there...
comment: No OCR to auto input fields from receipts.  Doesn't let you generate custom receipts. Can't crop pics to cut down on storage. No auto cloud backup.  Also, I wish it displayed the trip total when you're within a trip.
Perfect receipt tracker

title: Great product
comment: This is a great product, the only reason I didn't give it one more star is because you cannot save the file into the SD card or internal memory it has to be emailed or being and so on so forth. And also once you attach a picture of the receipt you can't remove it you have to replace it

title: Nearly Perfect
comment: This app does nearly everything I want and need in a receipt tracker. Great job! My two wishes are 1) an option to delete the image from my "gallery" after creating the receipt, and 2) optional OCR conversion of the receipt to text (in order to make receipts searchable). Thanks for the great app!

title: Fantastico
comment: I use this on every trip. Great job.

title: Great App
comment: Does what is was intended for and does it well
President

title: Love this thing!!
comment: Loving it! My bro told me about this expensive app but I wasn't sure I'd like it. Now that I've found yours, he's cancelling his membership & switching to this. Great job guys!!

title: Great app galaxys5
comment: Best of all I tried. Only wish - save the location name permanently, even after sending report

title: Cropping
comment: Great App but I wish I had the ability to crop the receipts... Also, when you set the default trip length to 7 days, it instead sets it to 8 days... Thanks

title: Great app a must have!
comment: I love this app! Can't wait for the new features! Thanks so much for the help and support!

title: Great Receipts Application!
comment: Simplifies the process of compiling your receipts into an easy to read PDF report with an optional summary page. The biggest function it lacks is OCR recognition but the developer has stated that's planned for a future release. A feature I would highly recommend is the ability to append a receipt that may be from another image source stored on the phone and not just. From the camera. Another good feature would be the ability to merge a page from an existing PDF document such as airfare receipts. 5 stars.

title: Simple and sweet
comment: Does what it advertises. Simple idea implemented clearly. Well worth the money. OCR would make it awesome!

title: Works great
comment: Lots of customizable options, so much easier than carrying around loads of receipts.  Also, contacted their support with a question and actually got a person that had an easy answer for me.

Tried the free version and noticed that it was missing something that would be very useful to me.  Contracted the developer and he was able to make the change for me.  It now is perfect for the reports I need to run for my work expenses.  No more wallet full of receipts!

title: Love it
comment: Does as described. Travel lots for work and I keep track of all my receipts with this app. Exporting report looks great. Have recommended it to others. Nobody has unfriended me yet!

title: Awesome program
comment: I have tried a lot of reciept tacking programs this is the one I keep returning to, it is easy,  reliable and most importantly customisable, I must also add the service is excellent

title: Very effective.  Great support.
comment: I use this weekly and I have contacted the developer twice.  He's very responsive.  We could be old friends.  My only wish:  allow me to import email receipts so I don't have to take photos of my computer screen.

title: Great App!
comment: Great example of an app designed to do one thing very well. It has simplified keeping track of receipts and filing expense reports.

title: Excellent programme
comment: The App works for me.

title: Updated @ 2.5 Months: Easily The Best!
comment: After auditioning numerous apps late last year, I'm now at 2.5 months of actual use with Smart Receipts Pro. I'm pleased to report 0 issues! I operate a sole proprietorship, so I need reliable and efficient business tools to save time and hassle. Smart Receipts was the only app that met my needs. Other reviews touting outstanding support were critical in my decision making (and proved to be 100% accurate). Developer has many enhancements on the drawing board, which is important for any app. Go Pro!!

title: Great App
comment: I would like to back everything up but the file is too large to email and email is the only option it allows....

title: Perfect app for expenses!
comment: Has saved me countless hours already... best $2 that I have ever spent!

title: Great expense tracker
comment: Awesome app. The latest version can now record distance. I can track travel, receipts and then generate a PDF report then cut and paste into the Company approved expenses form.  The distance option is a real big bonus, makes it really easy to capture all the different trips.  Once do I attach the report from SR and off it goes to accounts! Love the totals helps make sure I havent missed anything.

title: Just perfect for me!
comment: App does exactly what I need.  I capture receipts on the go, and can just throw the paper away.... It took me a while to trust it to that extent, but it has never let me down.  No more wallet stuffed with receipts!  A bonus would be to auto backup to a cloud service and be able to archive or hide submitted reports though.  Still gets 5 stars for making my work travel a breeze.  I use it almost every day.

title: Great App
comment: Would be nice to have desktop access too.

title: Great app
comment: For keeping track of expenses.  Saves me hours every month.

title: Very good work
comment: Better than my app provided by our cloud service provider to track expenses. I use this and reinput into the web page. This way, it is also a good check as I can see if I get the same number in both systems to see if I made a fat finger mistake. Only thing I would like is intelligent changing of item type based on description, I keep forgetting to change it.

title: Awesome..great service
comment: Wow when I first tried to download it..the app didn't load..so I bought the app and it still didn't load...so I wrote to the maker of this app..he was so helpful...loved that he took the time to make sure I was a happy customer..turned out it was a glitch in the app store that day...next day it downloaded no problems...but was super nice of Will to help like he did..thanks...and anyone who is interested...app is amazing..and so helpful
Photo can be difficult to focus
Great App and the developer is very helpful and prompt to answer your questions.

title: Great app
comment: Simple easy to use.  Produces what it says. Even better,  I had a question.  Sent an email and the question was answered promptly. You don't see that much any more.  Thanks.

title: A very nice app. Works well.
comment: I tried the free version for a week and felt it is a very good application, that handles my needs. I went ahead and purchased the very reasonable ad free version for $2.99. How can you beat that. I am sure the developer has put quite some time into this, since it addresses the need to capture receipts and produce good organized reports. Nice job. I plan on email the developer about date range options, I hope his response is a good as the app.

title: Awesome App & Developer
comment: The app is great. The developer even took the time to respond to my questions and react to suggestions.   He deserves five stars as well.
Best app

title: Simply Great!
comment: I use this app to keep track all my daily expenses and I know exactly what I'm spending my money on. It has helped me not spend as much now.

title: So easy to use!
comment: Easy to use and flexible. It does what it says.

title: Simple, clean, powerful, and user friendly
comment: With a few small tweaks this app would be perfect.

title: Awsome
comment: Hands down the best receipt tracking app on Android. I have been using this app for 3 years.

title: Awesome app
comment: Organizes everything with ease! Thanks!

title: So simple
comment: As this is so easy to use, I actually get my expenses reimbursed. So much easier than having to collate receipts at the end of a trip, I record them as I go, on the go :-)

title: Awesome app and developer
comment: The app simplifies receipt management and is exceptionally fast compared to many other apps I have tried. Definitely worth much more than the cost of the Pro version. In addition,  Will is responsive and attentive to support needs and product enhancements.  Will recommend to my peers.

title: Simple to use, does what it is supposed to do.
comment: I need to keep track of expenses for 3 different small businesses.  This works great for me.

title: I like it.
comment: Wish it was just a few clicks shorter to create a report. Otherwise, it's really very good for the purpose.

title: Perfect fit
comment: Great app, works as advertised
Makes it so easy to keep track of receipts and submit my expense reports on time.

title: Best Receipt  app
comment: I tried 5 other Receipt apps. This has the best of all in one app. Also has a customizable and  user friendly interface
Receipts pro
Best expense app.   Very simple.

title: Love it! For travel and regular.
comment: Massive time saver. It is really good. It has a decent manual backup option, auto cloud backup option could be a minor improvement.

title: Perfect for business travel
comment: Makes expense reports a breeze.

title: Quick easy receipt tracking
comment: I really love this app. Very simple and affordable. There is no reason to pay for a recurring service. Pro tip: to import a PDF receipt, go to the PDF (wherever it exists) and open it with Smart Receipts.

title: Makes Receipts Easy
comment: This app makes scanning and managing receipts a breeze. I use it to scan all my paper travel receipts and turn them into a nice PDF report suitable for inclusion with an invoice.
Does the job with no strings attached.  Best app for recording business trips!

title: Great
comment: If it could export to pdf but by a date range that would be awesome

title: Fantastic app
comment: This is an excellent app for keeping track of receipts for business expense reports. Really well done. Samsung Galaxy S5.

title: Simplifies life
comment: This eliminates mounds of loose receipts and does all the work for you. The second I get a receipt I take a photo of it and never look back. Lost receipts are a thing of the past.
You request to be emailed, yet your email nor your website are listed here.

title: Had to buy it for support
comment: Think UI could do with a bit of refinement but content wise its 90% there so happy to pay for it a teasing the free one for a few month. Would be cool if there was a Web page listing future features users could vote to have developed/fixed next. Happy to support this app going forward, keep up the good work!

title: Great way to track receipts
comment: I tried the free version first Mar 2013 and shortly after bought the app so I could change/add the category names.still using it ...Sept 2014

title: Perfect
comment: I used this app for a while and loved it, then my company gave me a Neat scanner and I'm still wondering why I used it for almost a year lol. Seriously this app for me is more productive than the whole Neat setup.

title: Smart Receipts Pro
comment: This is a great app. Turns a tedious task into an easy one. Will was SUPER helpful after my phone was destroyed. Great App, Great Developer!!

title: Great app
comment: Would be 5 star if you could post credits on the statement

Hi Chris, You can enter negative values for your receipt prices. This should allow you to post credits. Feel free to email me if you have questions.
Thanks,
Will

title: Great app..
comment: Only issue I have is larger files will not send report in email and cant print... other than that great app

title: Perfect.
comment: I use this all the time and makes sorting out my expenses so much easier....and accepted by my accountant and the tax office.

title: Good App
comment: Easy to use. Many customization settings. I'm in construction and use this so I don't worry about lost receipts. Also useful for personal. I'll always have a brand new receipt for returns to store. I have also emailed the developer about syncing across multiple devices and he said he was working on it. Buying full version to support developer. Good job.

title: Sweetness
comment: What a great program! I absolutely love this app. Organizes my expenses with photo documentation of the receipts. Support also superb. Good job Will!

Great app but I saved to my sd card before system restore and it doesn't seem to want to recognize this file now. I had too many receipts to email I had to save onto my sd chip or lose it. Please explain!
Hi Louis, I can help but don't have enough characters in this text to respond, but please email me and I'll help you get everything back

title: Works as advertised.
comment: Great at keeping track of expenses. Just upgraded to the galaxy 5 still works great. The developer is very fast with responses to questions.

title: Super $ and time saver
comment: App makes it very easy to capture receipts. I don't lose them now  and miss out on reimbursement. Everyone hates doing expense reports, but  this app makes it simple and fast
Great pics easy to use would recommend!

title: This thing is AWSOME!
comment: This is the easiest most functional app I've seen in a long time and the tech support by Will was quick and very helpful, I purchased it to support his efforts. I highly recommend it.   Thanks Will,   Lalo

title: Great app!!!! Efficient and pragmatic!
comment: I had questions and trouble within the first few uses and decided to contact the developer. He promptly responded to any questions and took my ideas. This app beats all other receipt apps because of the simple of ease with the software. Love it!!!!

title: Smart receipts pro.
comment: Great app! Very easy and quick to use. Turns expense report prep from a hated activity to a pleasure.

title: Almost perfect
comment: I wish the app had a way to auto backup to drop box or Google drive like once every 24 hours or if it could be kept in sync whenever you opened or closed the app.  That would make it perfect at backing up very important business expenses.

title: Excellent app and good service
comment: Meets my need for an app to quickly store receipts, and extract the receipts images when I need them. Great customer service too, quick response. 2 suggestions: add function to search gallery for existing images; add function to export specific receipts to email instead of whole report

Excellent app..does exactly what I need to do..and developer is great on getting back to you on any issues you may have..Give this app a try and if u have any ? Email him he will get right back to you to help resolve your issues and answer any questions you may have. ..5 stars all the way!!

title: Great app!
comment: Saves me so many hours every month. Bought the paid version to support the developer, as he was so helpful when I needed support. Don't hesitate to download this app.
Awesome app.  Love it!!!!

title: One of the most useful apps I have come across.
comment: Been using SR Pro for over two years; it has worked very well. The interface is easy to use and flexible; backups are no problem to create and store. If you are looking for a simple way to keep track of receipts, this is the way to go.

title: Awesome
comment: Awesome App.

title: Great app, but...
comment: Can't discover how to import a PDF receipt as promised.

title: Very nice receipt app
comment: Easy to use and exports great reports.

title: Nice
comment: Wonderful app. Easy to keep track of all your receipts.

title: Very useful app and it works well
comment: This app handles multiple currencies although not conversions. It did fail once after an Android upgrade but after a quick email to the author, I received a beta the following day which fixed the problem and the official release a few days later via the play store.
Yay for customizable categories!!#
Excellent app

title: Keeping Track
comment: Great way to keep track

title: Great app, everyone should have
comment: This app is great.   It has saved me hours of work, everyone needs this and it is worth the purchase. I will also add that dev support was amazing.   I had some questions and the dev was quick to respond and help.   Great app, great developer, great support. Thanks

title: Awesome
comment: Saved me lot of time and totally worth!!

title: Thank you!
comment: Worth every$

title: Very easy to create entries, take pictures, and send to email.
Fast and easy
comment: Love this app.

title: Fantastic app.  I tried several scan apps and the beat them all
comment: Works great on a Next book and my RAZR.  Tip-I like the native camera better.

title: A great money saver.
comment: I need to submit images of my receipts on a weekly basis. This app is great for taking those images and outputting them as a single pdf report.

title: Love it!
comment: Great app, makes giving my receipts to our company accountant a breeze! She's very happy with the PDF report she now gets on a monthly (ish!) bases!

title: Excellent!
comment: Such a good app. Was using the free app but I wanted to pay its so good. Great for tax and keeping a personal budget

comment: Fantastic

title: Great app for personal and business.
comment: This app just keeps getting better and better.

title: Gets the job done.
comment: I like that this doesn't try to be to much.. nice and simple and effective.  Well done.

title: Almost perfect
comment: Request: support for Nexonia.  Great email support! Glad to pay for this.

title: Great App, Great Support
comment: Had the original app and upgraded to the Pro Version.  The developer was quick to respond to my conversion questions, and very clear and helpful.  Love this app, and comes with great support.  Worth the 3 bucks.  Spend more a Starbucks.

title: Nice App, but recent versions are buggy.
comment: This is a great, simple receipt manager.  The only nuisance I've experienced is that newer versions seem to have trouble retaining the distance values for more than a day or two.  I track mileage elsewhere so it isn't a deal breaker, as mileage was never the apps best feature.
Simple yet helpful enough

title: Smart Receipts is exactly what it says it is.
comment: Been using this application for 2-3 weeks now. Love it! Will thank you so much for putting this program together. Sending you a email for tech support. This is a easy way to put our finances in order. Much needed!
Excellent ..don't need high school diploma to used it like a pro..

title: Great app
comment: Awesome reporting, great support

title: Awesome
comment: Great app!

title: great lightweight receipt app
comment: this is just what i wanted for backing up receipts.  report generation and backups are great.  when getting a new device, i had a bug, the developer was readily available and quick to respond with a solution.

title: GREAT !!
comment: Great Update Thanks for this Amazing App :)

title: Basics missing
comment: Can't create new categories, doesn't sync when installed on another device, also would be nice to have entry entered on calendar if one desired.

Hi Alvin,
You can create new categories by clicking the menu button and selecting the "Categories" option. I'm adding the other two features. Thanks!
Great for expensing lunches. Does everything I expected

title: Love this application
comment: I didn't realize I had both the Pro and regular version of Smart Receipts on my phone. During this last update only the standard copy got updated. How do I update the Pro version I have on my phone?

title: Makes Home Business a Breeze
comment: I love this app because I have a small business and it allows me to keep a low overhead while allowing me to be able to create the same expense reports big businesses do.  I recently upgraded to a new phone however the app only allows you to export data and not import data. Now all my reports are gone inside the app on my new phone. Is there a fix for this? Help!

title: Great app!
comment: After four days of using the free app I upgraded to the paid version - well worth it!

title: Very good app.
comment: Great functionality. Some additional features would be welcome such as copy or recurring library.

title: Perfect.. 100% KickAss
comment: Create a Chart of Accounts with the categories, Meta data stamped on each JPEG, Has a user ID so if using multiple devices record shows who entered it (MUST BE 4 DIGITS), easy to use...... Make the 'name' unique, it is stamped on  jpeg and it is the name given to the associated jpeg file, makes it easier to find the receipt. I used the store name with the last 6 of the receipt number. All the exporting options are perfect. Can even customize headers in CSV file. Transferred multiple 50meg files to DropBox

title: Very efficient
comment: Got this one a week ago and can no longer see any of my many travels without it.
Hi Nicolas, Was this due to the upgrade from the free to paid version? Email me and I'll help you get your trips back. Thanks, Will.

title: Great one
comment: If it can be accessed by computer, or if you have computer version, that will be great.

title: Very handy.
comment: Excellent tool for keeping track of my tax deductible purchases.
Does exactly what it needs to do, intuitive and easy to use.  I use it for all my expense reports.

title: Almost Perfect
comment: This application is a great  timesaver. Makes expense reports a breeze.  Love the feature to upload to GDrive or Skydrive.  The app would have five stars but for an annoying bug when uploading to Gdrive.  It always fails in first attempt but succeeds in second. (Galaxy S3)  The developer is extremely responsive to questions and suggetions.  One of the best apps that I have used.

title: Great Product
comment: Does everything I need it to and makes my job easier Thank You developer!

Hi Aaron,
This is possible using the "Backup" option in the settings menu. Would you mind emailing me, and I can provide more information for how to work this process.
Thanks,
Will

title: Concerned
comment: I really like this app but somehow it seems to have set itself as the default apk launcher on my phone (for sideloaded apps), which is really worrying.  Will Baumann: How can I disable this pls?

Hi Edward,

Strange - Never seen this before at all. Would you mind emailing me, so we can discuss in more detail.

Thanks,
Will

title: Easy and quick to use
comment: Has all the functions needed for a receipt application, especially compiling all images into a PDF file and all entries are entered into a CSV format. Paid version of application is completely worth it.

title: Perfect!
comment: My company uses the expense reporting built into SFDC and I have to upload images of all of my receipts. Just use SmartReceipts, create an expense report then have it email you a zip of the images. The image names even have the text from the name you enter after taking the image in the image file name.

title: Great App for Tracking Receipts
comment: I've contacted the developer several times now and he is very conscientious about adding features that are suggested.  Looking forward to using this app into the future to track and submit my traveling receipts.  I was impressed with the free version and bought this version to support the developer.

title: Very usefull
comment: Does what it says. Quite professional tool. I do my monthly calculations using that tool. And I'm no longer worried if I will loose my receipt as it keeps all copies. Very handy.

title: Finance dept is very happy
comment: I am (was) not good with keeping receipts until i get back to the office. This makes it so easy. Quite a time (and lecture from finance) saver.
Useful app
Great time saving app
Great app, no more piles of paper at the end of the month!

title: Excellent
comment: Please add dropbox and gallery pics

title: Handy
comment: Well thought out, handy to use I can see me capturing a lot more taxable expenses using this app, would like an advanced travel log option for those who need it

title: Intuitive and saves time to the extreme
comment: This app has exactly what person needs to categorize receipts the instant you get them, and provides a fast and reliable way to generate reports.
I'm a traveling Clinical Research Associate and this thing is great for expense reports

title: Worth Every Penny -- and there's not many!
comment: I can't believe that an app that does EVERYTHING I want costs so little. I have checked out a number of receipt trackers and this is the one! Don't wait, if you are a road warrior in need of an Android solution that works, this is it. Highly recommended.

title: Great App
comment: Only wish it had a toggle between gross expenditures and expensible expenditures or showed both in diffrent colors.
Grwat app. Easy to use.  Functional.
Great app

title: Great app
comment: Does the job well

title: This has made my life so easy
comment: I fell in love with this app the moment that I found it!    I was totally that person with the pocket full of crumpoles reciepts that may or may not have made it home from a trip and to the scanner.     Finding this app and making a point to scan and enter each reciept as I go through my day (travelling every other week for work) has been phenomenal.   I love that I can name each expense report and adjust the size of the images so that my final PDF is named correctly and under 1 MB.    It is rare that I actually find an app that makes life easier, but this is one!!

title: I am now giving this a 5 stars from 3
comment: Because of everything you have added and fixed my company uses this app like crazy and will always continue to use it.. thanks
Amazing app, saves me tons of time each week.

title: Awesome!
comment: This app is the best in its class I could find. Looks really nice and super useful! Thank you so much!

title: Great App
comment: Awesome app, it does everything. Very user friendly too.

title: Fantastic app,.
comment: using it for legal & medical costs from an incident, i can now track my fuel, parking and medication expenses for my barrister to claim from the offender.

title: This app is a huge time saver
comment: After using the free version for a week, I did not hesitate to purchase the full version so the developer will be encouraged to add features. I used to dread doing my expense reports at the end of a business trip, but no worries now.  This app by itself justifies my decision to switch from the iPhone to my Galaxy Note 2. (4.1.2)  Thank you Mr. Baumann!!

title: Great saver
comment: I used to come home from a business trip and have to scan on all my receipts.  Now I just take pictures as I go.  Haven't had a single problem

title: Perfect!
comment: This app has everything I needed.  The main critical features for me were the ability to create custom categories and the ability to email the report as a CSV file - almost no other apps in the Play Store let you email to export.

title: Thomas
comment: So far do good. No issues of any kind. ATRIX HD

title: Amazing!!! could you...?
comment: This is just amazing and GREAT! No longer do I have to take 1-3 hrs of my time at the end of my weekly trips to do my expense reports. I'm done in a matter of minutes! Wow!  ...could you add the ability to pull pics from my gallery. This would take this program from "GREAT!" to "PERFECT" in my book. p.s. If you could add some sort of on-the-spot cropping feature I would I would probabaly love this app forever... :-)

title: Worth the 2 bucks
comment: I've enjoyed the free version so much on my tablet while traveling for work that I decided to pick up the app on my new Google Galaxy nexus. Didn't want ad spam on my cellphone so paid for the full app.

title: Great product and service
comment: This ap does exactly what it claims to do which more than satisfies my needs. When I lost data sure to a phone problem, the author did virtual backflips helping me restore data. His dedication is uncommon and welcome!

title: Fantastic
comment: I use this every week. Just the right blend of features and simplicity

title: Awesome app
comment: Does everything says it will do

title: Best expense report app ever!!!
comment: This app is essential for anybody who does a lot of traveling for work.  It makes documenting your expenses super easy.  Simply take a picture of your receipt, type in the amount and title, and categorize it.  It can even email your reports to you.  I highly recommend this app!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Simple but it meets my needs!! A very good app!!
comment: No ckmplaints here!!

title: Simple, Easy, and Error Free
comment: I agree with other users.  This application is simple, easy, and most of all, functions without errors.  The best $1.99 investment I ever made.  I can't seem to find anything wrong with it.  Does what exactly suppose to do.  It has made my life a lot easier when reporting expenses.  A nice feature or function to have would be a total by category by report or at lease when creating the PDF file.

title: Best thing that's ever happened to me!
comment: I always procrastinate on my expenses because my receipts get disorganized. Smart Receipts has made organizing my receipts natural and easy. Organize as you go. Love it!!

title: I Like It!
comment: Gives me just what I need for my company's expense report quick and easy!

title: Great app just what I wanted.
comment: The app does a great job of allowing me to document receipts as I go.  I love it just as it is, for what it is.  That said...  A nice adder would be a vehicle mileage feature.  Screen capture of online receipts would be nice, too.  Right now I take pictures of my laptop screen, which works ok.

title: A MUST for business travelers!
comment: If you travel for business and find scanning receipts a serious drag on your productivity, this app is a must have.  With SmartReceipts I can scan a receipt as soon as I get it, when I've got a layover, or in the hotel room.  This literally saves me several hours a month next to the office scanner.  I love the ability to email myself the PDF report of my receipts.  I merge the report with my expense report PDF and I'm done.  Love this app.

title: Awesome support
comment: What a brilliant app and also excellent support from Will. I had an issue with force close on ICS on my Asus Prime. With other apps I would have lost all my data but this update managed to keep it all. Can't wait to try the new features.

title: Fab005
comment: Awesome.  Huge time-saver.  I take pics and log receipts as i go during my trips and then directly send an email to my admin.  Would be nice to have the ability to customize output a bit more but the beauty is how simple it is to use.

title: Simple and useful
comment: Would rate as 5 except I don't see where to put receipts with negative values (returns).  Initially rated as 4 but changed to 5 after the developer included my suggestion on the next release. A+

title: Great Update!
comment: The full page receipt option is great for hotel and other large receipts.

title: Great with a catch
comment: I would like to be able to import my expense reports from the free version to the paid version.  Other than that I really like it. Helps the road warriors!!
